64060.summary: Some customers in the Crestview area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64060.title: July 15 - Winnipeg (Crestview) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
